mdRecord.dcterms:title: Blue Ridge Cemetery, Locust Grove District
mdRecord.dcterms:description: African-American Cemetery. Along the Blue Ridge Parkway (mile marker 145) across from the northern entrance to the Pine Spur Overlook. Floyd County Geographic Information System refers to this property as parcel # 22-21 and Classifies it as a Cemetery. It appears on the map to jut into Blue Ridge Pkwy. land.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
